key.name: monitor
key.description: On which monitor the dock is positioned.

key.name: move-app-menu-to-icon
key.description: Hide the built-in application menu and show it in the relevant icon menu instead.

key.name: stretch
key.description: Whether to to stretch the dock to fill the monitor edge.

key.name: alignment
key.description: How to align icons in the dock.

key.name: left-click
key.description: What to do when an icon is left-clicked.

key.name: middle-click
key.description: What to do when an icon is middle-clicked.

key.name: wheel-scroll
key.description: Whether to cycle windows when wheel scrolling on an icon.

key.name: hover
key.description: What to do when the mouse hovers over an icon.

key.name: media-controls
key.description: Whether to show media controls in the menu if supported by the application.

key.name: debug
key.description: Whether to send debugging information to the system log.
